title: Interpretation of fat in a dream: Seeing fat in a dream

preview.html: Seeing oil for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married woman, or an unmarried young man, whether he bought, cooked, ate, ate, etc., according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-NabulsiWe are talking about fat in a dream, and it is called fat or white meat, and fat is the fat that is removed from red meat and it is white in color. Interpretation of fat in a dream Seeing fat in a dream indicates strength of character, and it is said that she will have many offspring, and these offspring will be Males, not females. It is said that fat in a dream is inherited from the family. Trimming fat or fat for a married man shows power, prestige, high status and reputation and is one of the best visions that a married man can see in his life. Fat in a dream, if the fortuneteller sees it at a feast on a table, indicates Buying fat in a dream is a very big profit. As for a married woman, cooking fat in a dream is good and a blessing for her and her family if she is in the kitchen cooking this fat. Seeing her husband feeding on fat means that his status will rise. Whoever sees herself in a dream feeding her husband with fat means that Her husband will have a high status. Fat in a dream for a married woman means childbearing, and the meaning of that is that there will be pregnancy, but more than once, that is, praise be to God. It is one of the best visions that can be good for women, as well as for married people, meaning having children more than once and having many offspring. It is said that eating Fat, white meat, or lard in a married woman’s dream indicates the arrival of the traveler, and it is, of course, specific to the dreamer’s condition. It is said that eating fat in a dream is the fulfillment of a desire that the dreamer wants, but if visitors bring fat in the dream, then this fat means that you will get benefit from it that comes From these visitors: As for the pregnant woman, preparing fats and cooking them in a dream while she is standing in the kitchen indicates the ease of childbirth, God willing, blessed. Feeding the husband fats in a dream is pregnant and she will give birth to a child. She dreamed that it is possible for the pregnant mother to have certain specifications for a specific child. The vision tells you that you will give birth. A child. The condition of the child is yours, which is required with these specifications. Eating fat for a pregnant woman indicates the fulfillment of a wish, God willing, Blessed and Most High. As for eating fat for a single girl, it means marriage. It has been said that good character, fame, and a good conduct among men. Cutting off fat in one dream indicates the good that will come your way. It has been said many times, God willing, Blessed and Most High, by a relative. Eating fat from someone you know in a dream means marrying himAny unmarried girl, if She saw that someone made her fat, or fed her fat, or gave her a gift, then she will marry that person, God willing, Blessed and Most High. Religion, or a return to what was forbidden. The ointment with which they are treated indicates that seeing it in a dream indicates recovery from illnesses and the need for it in an illness that afflicted her. Perhaps the ointment indicates joy, pleasure, and recovery.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a child according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a baby Seeing a baby is one of the visions that gladdens the soul and delights the heart, but what is the significance of this vision? And does it have hateful interpretations? This vision has many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including that the infant may be male or female, and you may see him laughing, talking, or walking, and he may be in your arms while you are hugging him. What is important to us in this article is that we take a look at all the special cases and indications of the dream of a child. What is the interpretation of a dream of a child in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream of a child The interpretation of a dream of a child in a dream expresses the warmth of feelings, the union of hearts, friendliness, love, overwhelming happiness, tenderness, kindness, softness of character, purity of heart, spontaneity, sincerity of intentions, and distance from cunning. The infant represents new beginnings, successive changes in life, positive developments, growth and harvest, reaping many benefits, honesty and clarity, and avoiding ambiguity and randomness. If one sees a newborn in his dream, this indicates a clean diet, blessing in gains and fruits, goodness, success, comfort, happiness, changing the situation for the better, and receiving good news. If the infant is male, it symbolizes a weak enemy, simple problems and issues, and complications That can be solved, adapting to current circumstances and responding to urgent changes. On the other hand, seeing an infant expresses the pure part of you despite the changes in your traits, the part that you keep away from distortion and corruption and the tendency towards simplicity in life. This vision can be an indication of the need to take care of the little side that you hide from others and you may forget in the midst of life's struggles and daily activities, the importance of removing the burdens from your shoulders and taking a little burden. Participate in meditation and tranquility. In short, children are the jewel of life in this world, and the child enjoys a lot of sustenance, changing circumstances, joy of the heart, complete health, and freedom from diseases. Interpretation of a dream about a baby by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a child indicates many responsibilities and burdens, the accumulation of tasks assigned to you, immersion in the world and its fears and difficult events, and many challenges and ordinary battles. This vision also expresses constant work, diligent endeavor, and making every effort to achieve stability, stability, cohesion, and walking on intertwined paths in the hope of achieving absent goals and desires. A male infant indicates a heavy burden, whether in the matter of upbringing or education, providing the necessary needs, and managing the affairs of tomorrow. If a person sees that he is playing with a child, this indicates entertainment and staying away from heavy responsibilities, withdrawing from matters that occupy his time, exhausting his effort and vitality, and wasting his life without comfort or joy. If the fortune teller sees that he is breastfeeding a child, this indicates planning, arranging priorities, and starting to implement some plans and projects that will benefit him in the long term. If The child cried and screamed, this indicates strictness and seriousness in work and worries and problems arising from

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mask in a dream Seeing a mask in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of wearing a mask for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, if she buys the shape of a scary face, black and white, the clown, the joker and more Ibn Shirin Seeing a mask in a dream If a person dreams of a mask, it means that he will gain conviction. It expresses the knowledge of the person who saw the dream about some things that It was hidden in social and family life by a family member, as it expresses the occurrence of problems and great anxiety. At the same time, it is a reference to well-known figures in social life who say very bad things behind the back of the visionary and gossip and gossip, tarnishing his reputation at every opportunity. It is interpreted that the person who sees a mask in his dream should be very careful about people from Around him and people who could be his enemies in the problems he will face. Seeing a mask on a person in a dream means that he will have skill and ability in this work that will put him in front of people’s eyes whether it is a good or bad job. Going to a masquerade dance party in a dream represents... Receiving news full of joy and happiness from a distant person and that he will be very happy because of this news. Wearing a mask in a dream indicates that he behaves differently with everyone because of the setbacks that his insight will suffer as well as his love. Seeing someone wearing a mask in a dream shows that the dreamer will feel sad And anxiety is due to the hypocrisy of his friends and those he knows in his social life or in his workplace. Seeing someone taking off a mask in a dream expresses the dreamer’s knowledge of the events he is going through, and for this reason he will go through very difficult times. Seeing a girl wearing a mask on her face in a dream means that if If she sees that you are wearing a mask, this portends temporary troubles, because someone dear to you will misunderstand you, but you will benefit from this temporary disgust. If you dream that others are wearing masks, this portends your struggle with lies and envy. If you dream of a mask, this indicates that there is someone who is unfaithful to you and that your affairs will fail. If a girl dreams that she is wearing a mask, this foretells that she will be able to control a loved one. If she dreams that she takes off her mask or sees others doing so, this portends that she will fail to impress her lover. She needs to prepare her behavior after such a dream. If you see in the body that you are wearing a mask, this foretells that you will deceive your friends and have misleading and misleading thoughts towards them. Face mask or mask in a dream A mask in a dream has many meanings. Sometimes it is a symbol of camouflage or disguise behind an unreal persona. In many cases, a face mask symbolizes a thief, criminal or fraudster. Some masks in a dream symbolize protection and prevention, and similar masks protect against snow, dust, sand, and cold. A face mask or mask in a dream may indicate prowess in performing a distinct social role because some masks are used for theatrical or artistic expression, and both are

title: Interpretation of a tumor in a dream for a single, married or pregnant girl

preview.html: The meaning of a tumor in a dream is not cancer, but rather swelling of tissues, organs, or body parts according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a tumor in a dream: It indicates an increase in money, profit, or possessions, especially if this size is in the hand and seeing the size in the dream is a good and good omen, or parts of the body to descend. Punishment for the dreamer at the hands of the ruler of the state or one of the followers of the ministries and state bodies. Interpretation of size in one dream. To see a tumor in the dream of an unmarried girl or woman means profit, abundant goodness, and an increase in useful knowledge as long as it does not appear to her to be a malignant tumor (cancer), God forbid. And seeing the skin. A swelling in a dream is a sign of money or profits and gains. Some scholars and commentators say: Seeing a lump or swelling in the hand indicates work or work, and swelling of the leg or foot is a sign of travel and exile. As for seeing a single girl, if her chest, chest, stomach or stomach swells, Both, it means kindness, recovery from illness, happy news, or almost satisfaction of desires, and seeing a lump in the throat is love of liberation. As for an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she has been cured of a malignant tumor, this foretells that she will get married this year, and for the girl who sees her fiancé in a dream As if his hand had a tumor on it, this is it. A praiseworthy dream, as it portends the consummation of marriage soon. Interpretation of a tumor in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees a tumor on her hand or her husband’s hand in a dream, this is evidence of money, livelihood, and good things that will come. For a newly married woman to see a tumor in her stomach or breast, it foretells With her pregnancy within the next few months, God willing. Work and work. As for a married woman who sees a tumor on her face in a dream, this does not deserve praise at all, because it is an indication of presence or words that insult her, which are lies and slanderous statements that have no basis in truth. And seeing a married woman swollen in the neck or shoulder is a sign of faith and sacrifice. Interpretation of a tumor in a pregnant woman’s dream: As for seeing a tumor in a pregnant woman’s dream, the interpretation of seeing the location of the tumor on the head is no different from the leg, foot, chest, abdomen, or face, as it is This is generally the case when seeing a tumor in a dream. Pregnant women mean safety and recovery, God willing. A pregnant woman should be optimistic about seeing a tumor in her dream, because it indicates her safety and health and a change in her condition for the better, God willing. Interpretation of a tumor in a man’s dreamWith regard to the interpretation of seeing a tumor in a man’s dream, seeing a tumor in the head indicates... Anxiety, sadness, and exhaustion. A lump in the hand means money, profit, and work, and a lump in the foot or leg. The interpretation for this is: an important positive change that may be related to his work, residence, or social status in general. A man’s dream of a swollen face indicates people’s hatred and envy toward him, and increased backbiting and gossip. Against him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about going to a marriage exam in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about going to a marriage exam in a dream is wrong and can be overcome, in addition to the fact that the site and its managers have nothing to do with the interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about going to a marriage exam in a dream: If they see their husband going for an examination in a dream, this may indicate positive changes in their lives during this period. And God knows best. Seeing your husband going through some tests in a dream may mean that he is facing a problem and that he will overcome it, thanks to God. It is possible to see the husband going for an examination in the dream, indicating the events that he is going through in a changed way and he must ask God for help. Whoever sees in Her dream that her husband was going for an examination in a dream may indicate major material changes that may occur in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband leaving in a dream: In the event that a woman sees that her husband is leaving, this may indicate his need for great help during this period. Time. A woman’s dream of her husband leaving her may indicate a feeling of disappointment or despair during this time. If a woman sees her husband leaving her, this may indicate severe pain that she feels, anxiety, and tension from her husband. A dream of a husband leaving his wife in a dream may indicate his serious suffering or Being exposed to a major problem that arises between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband going on a bus trip in a dream: Seeing the husband going on a bus trip may indicate great sadness that he faces during this time and he needs to ask God for help. In the event that a woman sees that her husband is going on a bus trip in a dream This may indicate his inability to have significant control over his life during this period. A dream about a husband going on a bus trip in a dream may indicate some changes occurring in their lives in those days, and God knows best. Seeing the husband coming back to life to take his wife in a dream may indicate the soon relief that will befall him during this time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about praying for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about praying for a single woman: Prayer is a type of duty and God has imposed it on worship. It is one of the pillars of Islam, as stated in the Holy Qur’an when it says: (And performing prayer, paying zakat, and prostrating with prostration). The most important things said by interpreters, so follow us...! What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a single woman? Interpretation scholars say that seeing an unmarried girl praying in a dream means the good news that will come to her and the blessing that will come to her life. Also, seeing the dreamer praying in a dream in a way True, it symbolizes religiosity, purity, and walking on the straight path. As for seeing a girl praying in a dream, this indicates the good state and semi-comfort that will be achieved soon. If the dreamer feels distressed and sees her reciting prayer in her dream, this symbolizes the end of anxiety and alleviation of the problems she is suffering from. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is washing with clean water and performing prayer, this symbolizes her purity and her good reputation that people know. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream that she is praying on a chair while being able to stand, this indicates that she is working in a job that causes her psychological harm. Interpretation of a dream about praying for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing prayer in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the great successes that she will achieve soon. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream that she is praying in the opposite direction of the Qiblah, this indicates great distraction in her life and confusion in achieving... Her goal. As for seeing the lady in a dream performing the prayer correctly, this indicates her purity and good reputation. If she saw in a dream that she was praying behind a pious young man, it will give her good news about the imminent date of her engagement to a religious person. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is praying in A group, this symbolizes achieving goals and achieving their ambitions. As for seeing the dreamer in a dream praying inside the Grand Mosque in Mecca, this indicates the approaching time of performing the Hajj. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he has been praying and prostrating for a long time, this symbolizes good health and a long life that he will enjoy. What is the interpretation of street prayer for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is praying in the street, this will lead to many good things, and her marriage will approach. If she has already been engaged and sees in her dream praying in the street, this symbolizes receiving Good news soon. If the dreamer saw in a dream that he was praying in the street, this indicates the great joy and happiness that she will have. Ibn Sirin claims that seeing the dreamer praying in the street symbolizes many good things that will come her way. And for the dreamer to see in her dream That people pray in the street in large numbers, this means the good reputation that she is known for and that she is a person loved by everyone. Likewise, seeing the dreamer praying behind the imam in the street, heralds her imminent marriage to a righteous man. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the direction of the Qiblah for a single woman, if she sees an unmarried girl in the street. The dream is that she is praying for me in a dream

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead child in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead child in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Seeing a dead child in a dream is one of the dreams that carry evil meanings and bad news that a person receives. Many people in the Arab countries are searching for an interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead child in a dream from Al-Nabulsi, as he is one of the most famous scholars. Interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, this dream was interpreted according to the person’s social status. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead child in a dream by Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters known in the Arab countries according to Islamic standards. He interpreted many dreams, including the interpretation of seeing a dead child in a dream as follows: It indicates that the dreamer has gone through problems and difficulties in his life. Carrying a dead child in a dream indicates that the problems in a person’s life have passed. Seeing a dead child is evidence of the fortuneteller’s negligence. For comfort and failure in his life. The death of a child in a dream indicates that he will be good in his life. Interpretation of seeing a dead child by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of seeing a dead child in a dream according to the person’s social status, which many people take for granted. The interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a dead child is as follows: It indicates that the monarch makes hasty decisions without thinking about them. An unknown dead child in a dream is evidence of a person’s perception of the problems he faces in his life. Seeing a dead child in a shroud is a sign of the beginning of a new life full of happiness. A dead child and crying is evidence of the loss of many things in a person. Seeing a dead child and screaming loudly is evidence of the death of a close person. The silent cry of a dead child indicates that the dreamer has gotten rid of the problems of his life. Interpretation of a dream of a dead child for a married woman. Many married women dream of seeing a dead child In a dream, this has many interpretations according to well-known interpretation scholars, and the interpretation of a dream of a dead child for a married woman is as follows: The death of an unknown infant in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the end of her troubles and the beginning of a new life for her. Seeing a dead child is evidence that she has gone through many problems in her life. The death of a child means that he has been saved from a great evil. The death of a child in a married woman’s dream indicates her repentance and the beginning of a new life for her. Interpretation of seeing a dead child for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s dream of seeing a dead child is one of the dreams that carries a good meaning for the woman, which may happen to her in the future. near. The interpretation of seeing a dead child for a pregnant woman is as follows: The death of a child in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of intense concern for her fetus. Crying over a dead child in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the disappearance of problems and worries related to her. A dead infant in a dream symbolizes a pregnant woman free from pain. Birth. The death of a girl is evidence of her escaping from evil and getting out of the problems she suffers from. Seeing a dead child coming back to life in a dream Seeing a dead child coming back to life is one of the dreams that many people see and it has many interpretations depending on the person’s social status. The interpretation of seeing a dead child coming back to life in a dream is as follows: The return of a dead child to life indicates many things

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a smile in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a smile in a dream: A smile is one of the things worthy of praise in real life, and it was urged by the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, as he said that a smile on the face of others is sincerity, and the smile may be from someone familiar to you. . Or I don’t know, but its effect on the soul is subtle and pleasant, as it improves the mood, but dream scientists interpreted seeing a smile in a dream as good and blessed, but laughing out loud is not good, as Ibn Sirin explained that a smile on a stranger’s face indicates travel. A trip to a far away place and laughter from a relative indicates abundant livelihood, so we present to you in detail everything related to seeing a smile in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a smile by Ibn Sirin: A smile in a dream indicates joy and happiness. Seeing a newborn’s smile in a dream is a sign of blessing and good luck. Seeing a smile in a dream is good news for earning livelihood and money. Seeing a stranger’s smile in a dream indicates the dreamer’s journey. Dreaming of a dead smile in a dream indicates a reassured soul. Seeing a child’s smile in a dream is good news for livelihood and goodness. Seeing a smile in a dream is better than a dream. With laughter. Interpretation of a dream about a smile for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a man smiling at her, this is a sign of marriage. A smile in a dream is a sign of good luck. Seeing a smile in a girl’s dream from a man who does not know that she will marry a man in power. Interpretation of a dream about smiling for a woman Married: Seeing a married woman smiling in her dream is a sign of pregnancy soon. A smile in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness and living. Interpretation of a dream about a smile for a pregnant woman: Seeing her pregnant husband smiling at her in a dream is a sign of the presence of a male child. A smile in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates blessing, kindness, and abundance. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s smile: A man’s smile in a dream can indicate abundant livelihood and a prestigious job that he will soon obtain. Seeing a married man with a beautiful woman in a dream, so why should he marry her, and God knows best. A stranger smiled at a man in a dream, visions indicating a long journey. His dead smile in a man’s dream is A sign of sanctification and a good ending. Interpretation of the enemy’s smile in a dream: Seeing your enemy laughing in a dream is one of the things that causes anxiety and panic in the dreamer’s soul and may indicate negative energy hidden within him. Some people may see that the enemy’s smile in a dream is nothing but beauty and one face and may indicate many Goodness and distance from problems and opponents. A dream about an enemy’s smile can indicate the end of problems and the renewal of good social relations. The enemy’s unacceptable smile is evidence of the many problems and fears he is exposed to, and it may indicate the enemy’s machinations. What is the interpretation of seeing a child’s smile in a dream? Many of us see it. In our dreams there is a child who smiles at them and gives them many goods and livelihoods, so a child’s smile can indicate abundance of money and livelihoods and perhaps marriage with this person. If a person wants money and sees a child with a smile on his face

title: What did the leading scholars say about the interpretation of seeing a ruler in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing the ruler in a dream: Seeing the ruler in a dream: The vision for people from the common people is abnormal and very rare, but this vision carries within it many important interpretations that differ from one person to another. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the ruler or king in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The Mukhtaloon website explains what the scholar Ibn Sirin said. Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the ruler in a dream is as follows: Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing the ruler in a dream is one of the distinct visions that heralds a change in the life of the person having the vision for the better in all fields and an abundance of his livelihood. As for seeing a man in pajamas as if he had killed the ruler, it is evidence that he assumed an important position. And greatness in the state, as the vision shows the desire of the opinion to achieve something. When a person sees the ruler of the state in a dream with a smiling and happy face, this indicates the high position of the person with the vision in society, and he will also be a well-known person among the members of society. In the event that one sees the ruler In a dream, this indicates his assumption of power and a high relationship, and it also shows that the person having the vision has a strong personality. Ibn Sirin also explained that there is another aspect to the interpretation of seeing a ruler in a dream, which is that this vision symbolizes God Almighty and Ali. And if he sees him happy, it is considered so. Good news for the dreamer that God will please him and a good ending in the life of this world and the hereafter, and God knows best. If he sees a ruler in a dream and he is unknown to the person having the vision, this is evidence of the dreamer’s anxiety about revealing something he was hiding from people. It is worth noting that Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin explained that Seeing a ruler in a dream in general is a vision that brings a lot of goodness to the dreamer. Shaking hands with the president in a dream. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of shaking hands with a ruler or the president of the republic in a dream with many different interpretations, including the following: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the ruler in a dream shaking his hands and smiling at him, As a sign that the person having the vision will obtain a lot of goodness and benefits. If a person sees a ruler in a dream and there is a dispute between them, this is evidence that there are many problems in the life of the person having the vision and the absence of anyone to help him solve these problems. If the person having the dream is a merchant and sees himself in In a dream, he shakes hands with his boss, this means that the merchant will engage in large commercial activities and make abundant profits from them. Seeing the president in a dream divorcing his wife. There are many interpretations regarding someone who sees a ruler in a dream divorcing his wife, including the following: When a person dreams of the head of state divorcing his wife, this indicates isolation. The president from his position and his loss. When a person sees the president in a dream and he hits people with bullets, this is evidence that this ruler is calling people to heresies, sorcery, and disbelief, God forbid. Also, seeing the ruler divorcing his wife in a dream indicates the loss of the ruler and defeat in war, and thus the loss of power. Seeing the head of state in a dream is a sad matter. Seeing a ruler in a dream when he is sad indicates many things, including but not limited to: Seeing a person in a dream about the ruler with a sad face means that the person having the vision is far from his religion or that he is a person
